ej,munst101,P,malog901,Balls and strikes (Threw mask) ej,martb105,M,malog901,Second visit to mound ej,weave801,M,malog901,Second visit to mound by opposing manager Thurman Munson ejected by HP umpire George Maloney for throwing his mask while arguing balls and strikes; while Rick Dempsey was getting ready to replace Munson, Yankees Manager Billy Martin made a second trip to the mound during the same batter's plate appearance; Orioles manager Earl Weaver protested the game when the umpires did not eject Martin; Martin was then ejected by Maloney and when Weaver continued his tirade, he was also ejected by Maloney; Tippy Martinez finished the Tommy Davis' at bat and then was removed
